title: Cut the commute! Live at Maplewood!🚗
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'This charming Mountain View apartment community is centrally located amongst the top Silicon Valley companies and makes the perfect home for the techie.', 'Select a home from an array of generously sized studios and two bedroom floor plans.', 'All feature contemporary kitchens with designer fixtures, built-in microwave and dishwasher, ceiling fans, air conditioning and plenty of linen and closet space.', 'Outside, go for a swim in the sparkling swimming pool or relax in our beautifully landscaped grounds.', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'October 7, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Dogs and Cats Allowed: Residents are allowed a maximum of two pets per apartment.', 'A one-time security deposit and monthly rent fee of $75 is required for each pet.', 'The security deposit for the first pet is $500 and $350 for the second pet.', 'Please see a Leasing Associate for breed and weight restrictions.•$500 Deposit•$75 Monthly Pet Rent•2 Pet Limit', 'Deposit:', 'Leasing options:', '12 months', 'Leasing notes:', 'Application fee:', '55.58', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:',
